ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellqueen: Gilberto has enlisted the help of his younger brother in order to put him in good standing with the gangsters Gilberto works for, leaving a gruesome message for those who oppose them. Afterward, they visit their grandmother's grave. While there, the pits of hell open and the brothers get a hot dose of reality from an unexpected source.
The Skinny One: A crooked cop that preys on refugees is visited by those he persecuted and sent to the afterlife. Although he denies these perverse cruelties, his dead wife knows the truth.
Mine: A man, seemingly heart-broken at the loss of his wife, searches to be reunited with her beyond the grave. But is that what he really wants?
ComicInfo.Title: Hellqueen; The Skinny One; Mine
ComicInfo.Writer: Ed Brisson,Jeff Mariotte,Joshua Williamson,Jeff Mariotte,Ed Brisson,Joshua Williamson
